titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Optical Society on its 100th anniversary.
A resolution congratulating the Optical Society on its 100th anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Congratulates the Optical Society on its 100th anniversary.
Reaffirms the critical role that optics and photonics have played over the last 100 years and continue to play in the U.S. economy and the lives of the people of the United States.
Recognizes the importance of continued investment in fundamental optics and photonics research.
